{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03366v1", "title": "Relativistic dissipative hydrodynamics for particles of arbitrary mass", "summary": "Employing a kinetic framework, we calculate all transport coefficients for
relativistic dissipative (second-order) hydrodynamics for arbitrary particle
masses in the 14-moment approximation. Taking the non-relativistic limit, it is
shown that the relativistic theory reduces to the Grad equations computed in
the 'order-of-magnitude' approach.", "main_category": "nucl-th", "categories": "nucl-th", "published": "2025-05-06T09:38:51Z"}
